paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Thr60Ala, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: cardiac amyloidosis with transthyretin Thr60Ala mutation, developed demyelinating neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 72-year-old man of Irish descent, diagnosed at age 66 with cardiac amyloidosis with transthyretin Threonine60Alanine mutation (treated with diflunisal)...

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with severe demyelinating neuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is present in a family with a history of amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of amyloidosis.
key_quotes: This case expands the clinicopathologic spectrum of transthyretin amyloidosis and may represent complex disease and treatment effects.
Patients with transthyretin amyloidosis usually present with an axonal polyneuropathy, with occasional segmental demyelination.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted detailed information on the TTR variant Thr60Ala and its penetrance data.
